title: Onza IBEX all-terrain MTB tire claws back with softer, grippier rubber
content:
Continuing the tradition of naming their tires after beasts of the animal kingdom, Onza have reinstated the IBEX mountain bike tire with an all-new tread pattern, having killed the option off for a few years. The IBEX is back in 29″ and 27.5″ sizes with 2.4″ and 2.6″ widths, Trail (TRC) and Gravity casings (GRC),

The post Onza IBEX all-terrain MTB tire claws back with softer, grippier rubber appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
